parts:
You are connected to the REMPI Raspberry Pi.  This device is sited with the robot telescope, and accepts inputs which it displays on the 'Sensors' page, and controls outputs which can be accessed via the 'Control' page.

Please choose a page:

parts: This page sets system parameters for this pi01 unit.

parts.name: passwordset
parts.brief: shows the result of setting the paragraph

fields.para_text: The new password has been set.

parts: Note: If the password is lost, then the 'setup' directory and contents should be deleted, and the pi powered off and on.
The setup directory can be found at:
When the Raspberry pi is powered up, outputs can either take the values last set, or can take default 'on power-up' values set here.
